title: Project skins unavailable
body:
To Riot,

I recently purchased RP to buy a PROJECT skin, however they were disabled about 1/2 hour ago. Wasn't the end time for first strike 23:59 PDT (i.e. 2:59pm AWST)? If so, why were they disabled earlier than that time? Would appreciate if this can be resolved.

Thanks.

replies.body:
"Just a heads up the permanent and exclusive FIRST STRIKE loading screen decorations  are only available until September 15th at 23:59 PDT!
"Show that you were part of First Strike with exclusive loading screen cards until 9/15. Once First Strike ends, loading screen cards will be gone forever."
Starting on September 17th at 00:01 PDT and lasting through September 24th at 23:59 PDT, PROJECT Fiora, Leona, Lucian, and Zed will all be discounted to 975 RP from their normal 1350 RP price point."

Seems like between the 15th and the 17th (16th = today), they are wanted to be unavailable. I think that they set one time on one server/ time zone and adjusted it for the other countries :)
